name: Cross Reunion
summary:
Feature-length command battle RPG made by RPG Maker MV!
An epic omnibus story in which 4 of the 7 main characters are selected based on DQ4!

The heroes finally arrived at the Demon King's Castle...
He challenges the final decisive battle with the Demon King, but is annihilated by a certain betrayal.
In order to prevent the world from being destroyed, the heroes aim to reincarnate and save the world again...
